name: CodePipeline
backend: Tracks pipeline executions, build success rate, and stage durations.

name: CodeBuild
description: Continuous integration builds in isolated environments.
backend: Monitors build duration, queue size, and failure rate.

name: CodeDeploy
description: Automates application deployments to any instance.
backend: Simulates deployment states, error codes, and rollback metrics.

name: CloudFormation
description: Infrastructure as Code — manage AWS resources with templates.
backend: Tracks stack creation events and drift detection scans.

name: Route 53
description: Domain Name System — reliable global routing.
backend: Monitors DNS propagation latency and zone health.

name: Systems Manager
backend: Simulates patch compliance checks and agent connectivity.

name: Global Accelerator
description: Optimizes network paths for global users.
backend: Tracks endpoint availability and traffic routing efficiency.
